title: 03/23/21 DPS Hour 1 Dan Dakich
itunes:title: 03/23/21 DPS Hour 1 Dan Dakich
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, reaction to this past weekend's NCAA Tournament action--including the wilting of the B1G. Also, remembering Laker great Elgin Baylor. Plus, radio host, broadcaster and college basketball analyst Dan Dakich joins the program to reflect on the Big Ten's NCAA Tournament failures and who Indiana University should hire as its next men's basketball coach.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
